LanguageData.GloomyDeco_Board.label: board
LanguageData.GloomyDeco_Board.description: A message board filled with various news. A nearby settlement has burned down nearby? How sad.
LanguageData.GloomyDeco_Boat.label: boat
LanguageData.GloomyDeco_Boat.description: A perfectly buoyant boat. Why not spend time meditating on calm waters, away from this world of pain and hopelessness?
LanguageData.GloomyDeco_Box.label: box
LanguageData.GloomyDeco_Box.description: A container that is not only good for storing items, but also stopping bullets in an emergency.
LanguageData.GloomyDeco_Bucket.label: bucket
LanguageData.GloomyDeco_Bucket.description: A simple but efficient bucket. It can be used to transport water or store grains.
LanguageData.GloomyDeco_Cart.label: cart
LanguageData.GloomyDeco_Cart.description: A wheelbarrow that can store a lot of items. The wheels do not function.
LanguageData.GloomyDeco_Kennel.label: kennel
LanguageData.GloomyDeco_Kennel.description: A comfy home for small animals. For some reason, the animals sleep in anywhere except for these houses.
LanguageData.GloomyDeco_Lumberjack.label: stump
LanguageData.GloomyDeco_Lumberjack.description: The usual tree stump. It could be used to chop fireowod.
LanguageData.GloomyDeco_MailBox.label: mailbox
LanguageData.GloomyDeco_MailBox.description: A small and charming mailbox. What could be in the mailbox in such a bright, cheerful morning? \n\n Uh oh, it's a message about incoming raiders.
LanguageData.GloomyDeco_Rope.label: clothesline
LanguageData.GloomyDeco_Rope.description: An unremarkable clothesline that will do its job.
LanguageData.GloomyDeco_Scarecrow.label: scarecrow
LanguageData.GloomyDeco_Scarecrow.description: A cute scarecrow. It does not seem to retain its purpose of scaring crows.
LanguageData.GloomyDeco_Sign.label: crop sign
LanguageData.GloomyDeco_Stone.label: cobblestone
LanguageData.GloomyDeco_Tool.label: tool
LanguageData.GloomyDeco_Tool.description: A multitool with many different purposes. Unfortunately, colonists do not seem to know how it is used.
LanguageData.GloomyDeco_Well.label: well
LanguageData.GloomyDeco_Well.description: A well that can be used to acquire groundwater when dug far down. There seems to be no use for this.
LanguageData.GloomyDeco_Windmill.label: windmill
LanguageData.GloomyDeco_Windmill.description: A giant wheel that spins from the force of winds. This potential source of mechanical work is merely built for the colonists' amusement.
